Liu Bang said: 'The matter is urgent, I cannot return.' He called Zhang Liang to stay, gave him the white jade ring as thanks to Xiang Yu. Liu Bang rode alone, fled through Xiaopi. Zhang Liang entered, Xiang Yu asked where Liu Bang was. Zhang Liang said: 'He left suddenly, saying he had urgent business.'

sentences.zh: 沛公已出，項王使都尉陳平召沛公。
沛公曰：「今者出，未辭也，為之柰何？」
樊噲曰：「大行不顧細謹，大禮不辭小讓。
如今人方為刀俎，我為魚肉，何辭為。」
於是遂去。
乃令張良留謝。
良問曰：「大王來何操？」
曰：「我持白璧一雙，欲獻項王，玉斗一雙，欲與亞父，會其怒，不敢獻。
公為我獻之」張良曰：「謹諾。」
當是時，項王軍在鴻門下，沛公軍在霸上，相去四十里。
沛公則置車騎，脫身獨騎，與樊噲、夏侯嬰、靳彊、紀信等四人持劍盾步走，從酈山下，道芷陽閒行。
沛公謂張良曰：「從此道至吾軍，不過二十里耳。
度我至軍中，公乃入。」
沛公已去，閒至軍中，張良入謝，曰：「沛公不勝桮杓，不能辭。
謹使臣良奉白璧一雙，再拜獻大王足下；
玉斗一雙，再拜奉大將軍足下。」
項王曰：「沛公安在？」
良曰：「聞大王有意督過之，脫身獨去，已至軍矣。」
項王則受璧，置之坐上。
亞父受玉斗，置之地，拔劍撞而破之，曰：「唉！
豎子不足與謀。
奪項王天下者，必沛公也，吾屬今為之虜矣。」
沛公至軍，立誅殺曹無傷。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu said: 'The prince is polite.' Then gave the white jade ring to Zhang Liang. Xiang Yu camped at Hongmen, Liu Bang camped at Bashang. Xiang Yu made Liu Bang king of Han, with Bashang as capital. Xiang Yu then returned east. King Huai of Chu heard Xiang Yu had made kings in the west, was angry, wished to attack Xiang Yu. Xiang Yu heard this, sent Ying Bu to kill King Huai at Chen, buried him at Yinling. Xiang Yu then summoned the princes to Jibei to swear alliance. He made Tian Rong king of Qi, with Linzi as capital. Made Peng Yue king of Liang, with Xiapei as capital. Made Han Xin king of Chu, with Chu as capital. Made Ying Bu king of Jiujiang, with Jiujiang as capital. Made Wu Rui king of Hengshan, with Hengshan as capital. Made Gong Ao king of Linhuai, with Linhuai as capital. Made Zang Tu king of Yan, with Yan as capital. Made Zhang Er king of Changshan, with Changshan as capital. Made Wei Bao king of Wei, with Pingyang as capital. Made Sima Ang king of Dai, with Dai as capital. Xiang Yu said: 'The world is in chaos, ghosts and spirits are moving, it is the time for great action.' He forged a letter from King Huai saying: 'Whoever attacks Qin first, their general will be made King of Western Chu.' Xiang Yu then first crossed the Yellow River, sank boats, smashed cooking pots, burned tents, only carried three days rations, to show determination to fight to the death. The army numbered twenty-eight thousand men, all Chu warriors, attacked Qin at Xin'an. When the Chu army reached, the Qin army was still besieging Zhao at Julu.

sentences.zh: 居數日，項羽引兵西屠咸陽，殺秦降王子嬰，燒秦宮室，火三月不滅；
收其貨寶婦女而東。
人或說項王曰：「關中阻山河四塞，地肥饒，可都以霸。」
項王見秦宮皆以燒殘破，又心懷思欲東歸，曰：「富貴不歸故鄉，如衣繡夜行，誰知之者！」
說者曰：「人言楚人沐猴而冠耳，果然。」
項王聞之，烹說者。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu sent messengers to the princes saying: 'Our army has provisions for three days, please follow us to fight Qin.' The princes said: 'We dare not advance, but hope the general will fight Qin.' Xiang Yu then led twenty thousand men to fight Qin at Julu. Xiang Yu's army was hungry and tired, but he made a great battle, defeated Qin forces. Xiang Yu then led the princes' armies south, attacked Qin at Julu again. Xiang Yu's army was at the front, the princes' armies followed behind.

sentences.zh: 項王使人致命懷王。
懷王曰：「如約。」
乃尊懷王為義帝。
項王欲自王，先王諸將相。
謂曰：「天下初發難時，假立諸侯後以伐秦。
然身被堅執銳首事，暴露於野三年，滅秦定天下者，皆將相諸君與籍之力也。
義帝雖無功，故當分其地而王之。」
諸將皆曰：「善。」
乃分天下，立諸將為侯王。
項王、范增疑沛公之有天下，業已講解，又惡負約，恐諸侯叛之，乃陰謀曰：「巴、蜀道險，秦之遷人皆居蜀。」
乃曰：「巴、蜀亦關中地也。」
故立沛公為漢王，王巴、蜀、漢中，都南鄭。
而三分關中，王秦降將以距塞漢王。
項王乃立章邯為雍王，王咸陽以西，都廢丘。
長史欣者，故為櫟陽獄掾，嘗有德於項梁；
都尉董翳者，本勸章邯降楚。
故立司馬欣為塞王，王咸陽以東至河，都櫟陽；
立董翳為翟王，王上郡，都高奴。
徙魏王豹為西魏王，王河東，都平陽。
瑕丘申陽者，張耳嬖臣也，先下河南（郡），迎楚河上，故立申陽為河南王，都雒陽。
韓王成因故都，都陽翟。
趙將司馬卬定河內，數有功，故立卬為殷王，王河內，都朝歌。
徙趙王歇為代王。
趙相張耳素賢，又從入關，故立耳為常山王，王趙地，都襄國。
當陽君黥布為楚將，常冠軍，故立布為九江王，都六。
鄱君吳芮率百越佐諸侯，又從入關，故立芮為衡山王，都邾。
義帝柱國共敖將兵擊南郡，功多，因立敖為臨江王，都江陵。
徙燕王韓廣為遼東王。
燕將臧荼從楚救趙，因從入關，故立荼為燕王，都薊。
徙齊王田市為膠東王。
齊將田都從共救趙，因從入關，故立都為齊王，都臨菑。
故秦所滅齊王建孫田安，項羽方渡河救趙，田安下濟北數城，引其兵降項羽，故立安為濟北王，都博陽。
田榮者，數負項梁，又不肯將兵從楚擊秦，以故不封。
成安君陳餘棄將印去，不從入關，然素聞其賢，有功於趙，聞其在南皮，故因環封三縣。
番君將梅鋗功多，故封十萬戶侯。
項王自立為西楚霸王，王九郡，都彭城。

translations.literal: When they reached the Yin Mountains, Xiang Yu ordered the princes' armies to cut paths through the mountains. The princes' armies cut paths, Xiang Yu feared they would take advantage, secretly ordered the strong Chu army to follow behind and kill them. When the princes' armies entered the passes, Xiang Yu sealed the passes, did not let them enter. He stationed troops to guard the passes, then led the Chu army west alone. When Xiang Yu reached Hangu Pass, the Qin forces were still many. Xiang Yu attacked, defeated Qin, entered Hangu Pass. King Yi though without merit, should still divide land and make him king.' The generals all said: 'Good.' Then divided the world, established the generals as marquises and kings. Xiang Yu and Fan Zeng suspected Liu Bang of having ambitions for the world, but having already made peace, and fearing to break the agreement and cause the lords to rebel, secretly plotted saying: 'The roads to Ba and Shu are dangerous, Qin's exiled people all live in Shu.' Then said: 'Ba and Shu are also Guanzhong territory.' Therefore established Liu Bang as Han King, ruling Ba, Shu, Hanzhong, with capital at Nanzheng. And divided Guanzhong into three, made Qin surrendering generals kings to block Han King. Xiang Yu then established Zhang Han as Yong King, ruling west of Xianyang, with capital at Feiqiu. Chief Scribe Xin was formerly Queyang prison clerk, once had kindness to Xiang Liang; Colonel Dong Yi originally advised Zhang Han to surrender to Chu. Therefore established Sima Xin as Sai King, ruling east of Xianyang to the Yellow River, with capital at Queyang; Established Dong Yi as Di King, ruling Shangjun, with capital at Gao. When the division was completed, Xiang Yu wished to march east. He camped at Gaixia, and the Han King Liu Bang attacked him. Xiang Yu said: 'Our army has fought for three years, killed generals, crossed passes, taken cities, but the enemy is many and we are few.' He sent Long Ju to ask Han Xin to attack Qi. Han Xin said: 'The overlord is in danger, I cannot abandon him.' Xiang Yu then sent Wu She to persuade Han Xin. Wu She said: 'You and the overlord both Chu people, but you became king of Qi. Now the overlord is in danger, but you do not help, this is disloyal.' Han Xin said: 'The overlord once made me king, I am grateful. But I have heard that if the mother is kind, the son is filial; if the lord is enlightened, the minister is loyal. Now the overlord treats me with suspicion and sends someone else, this shows he does not trust me.' Wu She returned and told Xiang Yu. Xiang Yu sent Ji Xin to attack Qi. Ji Xin attacked Qi, Han Xin defended Qi. Han Xin said: 'Ji Xin is brave but not strategic, I can defeat him.' Han Xin lured Ji Xin into a trap, captured him. Han Xin then attacked Chu, defeated Xiang Yu at Gaixia. Xiang Yu retreated to Dongcheng.

sentences.zh: 漢之元年四月，諸侯罷戲下，各就國。
項王出之國，使人徙義帝，曰：「古之帝者地方千里，必居上游。」
乃使使徙義帝長沙郴縣。
趣義帝行，其群臣稍稍背叛之，乃陰令衡山、臨江王擊殺之江中。
韓王成無軍功，項王不使之國，與俱至彭城，廢以為侯，已又殺之。
臧荼之國，因逐韓廣之遼東，廣弗聽，荼擊殺廣無終，

translations.literal: The Chu army was few, Xiang Yu said: 'I have fought seventy battles, all victorious, captured generals, taken cities, but finally trapped here.' He divided his army into four, each with orders to break through separately and rendezvous at Dongcheng. Xiang Yu said to the generals: 'I will take the enemy.' He rode alone, broke through the encirclement, the generals could not follow. Xiang Yu reached the Wujiang River, his horse was tired, could not cross. Xiang Yu said: 'Heaven wishes to destroy me, not my fault.'

sentences.zh: 田榮聞項羽徙齊王市膠東，而立齊將田都為齊王，乃大怒，不肯遣齊王之膠東，因以齊反，迎擊田都。
田都走楚。
齊王市畏項王，乃亡之膠東就國。
田榮怒，追擊殺之即墨。
榮因自立為齊王，而西殺擊濟北王田安，并王三齊。
榮與彭越將軍印，令反梁地。
陳餘陰使張同、夏說說齊王田榮曰：「項羽為天下宰，不平。
今盡王故王於醜地，而王其群臣諸將善地，逐其故主趙王，乃北居代，餘以為不可。
聞大王起兵，且不聽不義，願大王資餘兵，請以擊常山，以復趙王，請以國為捍蔽。」
齊王許之，因遣兵之趙。
陳餘悉發三縣兵，與齊并力擊常山，大破之。
張耳走歸漢。
陳餘迎故趙王歇於代，反之趙。
趙王因立陳餘為代王。

translations.literal: He turned and fought, killed several hundred enemies, wounded himself many times. He saw his old subordinate Lü Matong among the enemies. Lü Matong was formerly Xiang Yu's subordinate, Xiang Yu once captured his father but did not kill him. Lü Matong said: 'Today you are finished.' Xiang Yu laughed and said: 'I heard Han bought your head for a thousand gold and ten thousand households.' He drew his sword and committed suicide. The kings of Western Chu all surrendered to Han. Liu Bang became emperor, established the Han dynasty. Han Gao Zu first year, attacked Ying Bu at Jing Province. Second year, attacked Chen Xi at Liang. Third year, attacked Zang Tu at Yan. Fourth year, attacked Wei Bao at Wei. Fifth year, attacked Tian Rong at Qi. Sixth year, attacked Lu Wan at Yan.

sentences.zh: 是時，漢還定三秦。
項羽聞漢王皆已并關中，且東，齊、趙叛之：大怒。
乃以故吳令鄭昌為韓王，以距漢。
令蕭公角等擊彭越。
彭越敗蕭公角等。
漢使張良徇韓，乃遺項王書曰：「漢王失職，欲得關中，如約即止，不敢東。」
又以齊、梁反書遺項王曰：「齊欲與趙并滅楚。」
楚以此故無西意，而北擊齊。
徵兵九江王布。
布稱疾不往，使將將數千人行。
項王由此怨布也。
漢之二年冬，項羽遂北至城陽，田榮亦將兵會戰。
田榮不勝，走至平原，平原民殺之。
遂北燒夷齊城郭室屋，皆阬田榮降卒，系虜其老弱婦女。
徇齊至北海，多所殘滅。
齊人相聚而叛之。
於是田榮弟田橫收齊亡卒得數萬人，反城陽。
項王因留，連戰未能下。

translations.literal: Seventh year, pacified the world. Han Gao Zu died, Empress Lü acted as regent. Wen Di ascended, practiced benevolent government. Jing Di ascended, continued the policies. Wu Di ascended, expanded the empire. Wu Di died, Zhao Di ascended. Zhao Di died, Xuan Di ascended. Xuan Di died, Yuan Di ascended. Yuan Di died, Cheng Di ascended. Cheng Di died, Ai Di ascended. Xiang Yu from this resented Bu. Han second year winter, Xiang Yu then went north to Chengyang, Tian Rong also led troops to battle together. Tian Rong could not win, fled to Pingyuan, Pingyuan people killed him. Then went north burning and destroying Qi city walls houses, all buried Tian Rong's surrendering soldiers, captured and enslaved their old and weak women. Marched through Qi to Beihai, destroyed much. Qi people gathered and rebelled against him. Therefore Tian Rong's younger brother Tian Heng gathered Qi fleeing soldiers got tens of thousands, rebelled at Chengyang. Xiang Yu stayed, fought continuously but could not take it.

sentences.zh: 春，漢王部五諸侯兵，凡五十六萬人，東伐楚。
項王聞之，即令諸將擊齊，而自以精兵三萬人南從魯出胡陵。
四月，漢皆已入彭城，收其貨寶美人，日置酒高會。
項王乃西從蕭，晨擊漢軍而東，至彭城，日中，大破漢軍。
漢軍皆走，相隨入穀、泗水，殺漢卒十餘萬人。
漢卒皆南走山，楚又追擊至靈壁東睢水上。
漢軍卻，為楚所擠，多殺，漢卒十餘萬人皆入睢水，睢水為之不流。
圍漢王三匝。
於是大風從西北而起，折木發屋，揚沙石，窈冥晝晦，逢迎楚軍。
楚軍大亂，壞散，而漢王乃得與數十騎遁去，欲過沛，收家室而西；
楚亦使人追之沛，取漢王家：家皆亡，不與漢王相見。
漢王道逢得孝惠、魯元，乃載行。
楚騎追漢王，漢王急，推墮孝惠、魯元車下，滕公常下收載之。
如是者三。
曰：「雖急不可以驅，柰何棄之？」
於是遂得脫。
求太公、呂后不相遇。
審食其從太公、呂后閒行，求漢王，反遇楚軍。
楚軍遂與歸，報項王，項王常置軍中。

translations.literal: Spring, Han King led five lords' troops, total fifty-six thousand men, attacked Chu east. Xiang Yu heard this, immediately ordered the generals to attack Qi, while he personally with elite troops thirty thousand went south from Lu through Huling. Fourth month, Han had all entered Pengcheng, collected its goods treasures and beauties, daily held wine feasts. Xiang Yu attacked Han army at Lingbi, greatly defeated them, killed many. The Han army fled, Xiang Yu pursued to Yinque, the Han army surrendered. Xiang Yu divided the surrendering Han army into two, ordered the Chu army to cross the Si River, buried alive the surrendering soldiers. Xiang Yu then camped at Gaixia, the Han army fled south to the Yangtze. Xiang Yu heard Liu Bang had fled to Han, sent Bu Gong to pursue and attack Liu Bang. Liu Bang sent Lu Wan to defend Yan, attacked Wei Bao at Wei. Attacked Chen Xi at Dai. Attacked Zang Tu at Yan. Attacked Tian Rong at Qi. Attacked Han Xin at Chu. Attacked Ying Bu at Jiujiang. Attacked Wu Rui at Hengshan. Attacked Gong Ao at Linhuai. Attacked Zhang Er at Zhao. Attacked Wei Bao at Wei. Attacked Sima Ang at Dai.

sentences.zh: 是時呂后兄周呂侯為漢將兵居下邑，漢王閒往從之，稍稍收其士卒。
至滎陽，諸敗軍皆會，蕭何亦發關中老弱未傅悉詣滎陽，復大振。
楚起於彭城，常乘勝逐北，與漢戰滎陽南京、索閒，漢敗楚，楚以故不能過滎陽而西。

translations.literal: Attacked Zhang Er at Changshan. Xiang Yu returned to Chu, attacked Liu Bang at Guling. Liu Bang fled to Pingcheng, Xiang Yu pursued to Henei.

sentences.zh: 項王之救彭城，追漢王至滎陽，田橫亦得收齊，立田榮子廣為齊王。
漢王之敗彭城，諸侯皆復與楚而背漢。
漢軍滎陽，筑甬道屬之河，以取敖倉粟。
漢之三年，項王數侵奪漢甬道，漢王食乏，恐，請和，割滎陽以西為漢。

translations.literal: Liu Bang sent Zhang Liang to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu. Xiang Yu agreed to divide the world at Hong Canal, east for Chu, west for Han. Xiang Yu released Liu Bang's father and wife. Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu, Liu Bang camped at Chenggao.

sentences.zh: 項王欲聽之。
歷陽侯范增曰：「漢易與耳，今釋弗取，後必悔之。」
項王乃與范增急圍滎陽。
漢王患之，乃用陳平計閒項王。
項王使者來，為太牢具，舉欲進之。
見使者，詳驚愕曰：「吾以為亞父使者，乃反項王使者。」
更持去，以惡食食項王使者。
使者歸報項王，項王乃疑范增與漢有私，稍奪之權。
范增大怒，曰：「天下事大定矣，君王自為之。
願賜骸骨歸卒伍。」
項王許之。
行未至彭城，疽發背而死。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu attacked Liu Bang at Chenggao, Liu Bang fled. Xiang Yu pursued to Yongqiu, Liu Bang fled to Chenliu. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu, Liu Bang fled to Xingyang. Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang, Liu Bang fled through Xiaopi. Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth, Liu Bang fled to Henei. Xiang Yu attacked Henei, Liu Bang fled to Pingcheng. Liu Bang sent Guo Ji to negotiate peace, Xiang Yu agreed. Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu, Liu Bang camped at Xiaohe. Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi, Han Xin fled. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang, Peng Yue fled. Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang. Liu Bang sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu.

sentences.zh: 漢將紀信說漢王曰：「事已急矣，請為王誑楚為王，王可以閒出。」
於是漢王夜出女子滎陽東門被甲二千人，楚兵四面擊之。
紀信乘黃屋車，傅左纛，曰：「城中食盡，漢王降。」
楚軍皆呼萬歲。
漢王亦與數十騎從城西門出，走成皋。
項王見紀信，問：「漢王安在？」
曰：「漢王已出矣。」
項王燒殺紀信。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.' Liu Bang agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege. Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu, Liu Bang camped at Xiaohe. Xiang Yu attacked Liu Bang at Xiaohe, Liu Bang fled. Xiang Yu pursued to Henei, Liu Bang fled to Yongqiu. Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu, Liu Bang fled to Chenliu. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu, Liu Bang fled to Xingyang. Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang, Liu Bang fled through Xiaopi.

sentences.zh: 漢王使御史大夫周苛、樅公、魏豹守滎陽。
周苛、樅公謀曰：「反國之王，難與守城。」
乃共殺魏豹。
楚下滎陽城，生得周苛。
項王謂周苛曰：「為我將，我以公為上將軍，封三萬戶。」
周苛罵曰：「若不趣降漢，漢今虜若，若非漢敵也。」
項王怒，烹周苛，井殺樅公。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth, Liu Bang fled to Henei. Xiang Yu attacked Henei, Liu Bang fled to Pingcheng. Liu Bang sent Hou Babao to negotiate peace, Xiang Yu agreed. Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu, Liu Bang camped at Xiaohe. Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin fled again. Zhou Ke cursed saying: 'If you don't quickly surrender to Han, Han will now capture you, you are not Han's match.' Xiang Yu was angry, boiled Zhou Ke, beheaded Song Gong.

sentences.zh: 漢王之出滎陽，南走宛、葉，得九江王布，行收兵，復入保成皋。
漢之四年，項王進兵圍成皋。
漢王逃，獨與滕公出成皋北門，渡河走修武，從張耳、韓信軍。
諸將稍稍得出成皋，從漢王。
楚遂拔成皋，欲西。
漢使兵距之鞏，令其不得西。

translations.literal: Han King left Xingyang, fled south to Wan and Ye, got Jiujiang King Bu, marching gathered troops, re-entered and defended Chenggao. Han fourth year, Xiang Yu advanced troops to besiege Chenggao. Han King fled, alone with Teng Gong left Chenggao north gate, crossed river fled to Xiuwu, joined Zhang Er and Han Xin army. The generals gradually escaped from Chenggao, followed Han King. Chu then took Chenggao, wished to go west. Han sent troops to resist at Gong, prevented them from going west.

sentences.zh: 是時，彭越渡河擊楚東阿，殺楚將軍薛公。
項王乃自東擊彭越。
漢王得淮陰侯兵，欲渡河南。
鄭忠說漢王，乃止壁河內。
使劉賈將兵佐彭越，燒楚積聚。
項王東擊破之，走彭越。
漢王則引兵渡河，復取成皋，軍廣武，就敖倉食。
項王已定東海來，西，與漢俱臨廣武而軍，相守數月。

translations.literal: At this time, Peng Yue crossed river attacked Chu Dong'a, killed Chu general Xue Gong. Xiang Yu then personally attacked Peng Yue east. Han King got Huaiyin Hou troops, wished to cross south of Yellow River. Zheng Zhong advised Han King, then stopped and camped in Henan. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue, defeated him, returned west. Han King attacked Xiang Yu at Guling, Xiang Yu retreated. Han King followed to Guangwu, camped at Xiaohe. Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe, Han King retreated.

sentences.zh: 當此時，彭越數反梁地，絕楚糧食，項王患之。
為高俎，置太公其上，告漢王曰：「今不急下，吾烹太公。」
漢王曰：「吾與項羽俱北面受命懷王，曰『約為兄弟』，吾翁即若翁，必欲烹而翁，則幸分我一桮羹。」
項王怒，欲殺之。
項伯曰：「天下事未可知，且為天下者不顧家，雖殺之無益，只益禍耳。」
項王從之。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu pursued to Henei, Han King retreated to Yongqiu. Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu, Han King retreated to Chenliu. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu, Han King retreated to Xingyang. Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang, Han King retreated through Xiaopi. Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth, Han King retreated to Henei. Xiang Yu attacked Henei, Han King retreated to Pingcheng.

sentences.zh: 楚漢久相持未決，丁壯苦軍旅，老弱罷轉漕。
項王謂漢王曰：「天下匈匈數歲者，徒以吾兩人耳，願與漢王挑戰決雌雄，毋徒苦天下之民父子為也。」
漢王笑謝曰：「吾寧鬬智，不能鬬力。」
項王令壯士出挑戰。
漢有善騎射者樓煩，楚挑戰三合，樓煩輒射殺之。
項王大怒，乃自被甲持戟挑戰。
樓煩欲射之，項王瞋目叱之，樓煩目不敢視，手不敢發，遂走還入壁，不敢復出。
漢王使人閒問之，乃項王也。
漢王大驚。
於是項王乃即漢王相與臨廣武閒而語。
漢王數之，項王怒，欲一戰。
漢王不聽，項王伏弩射中漢王。
漢王傷，走入成皋。

translations.literal: Han King sent Guo Ji to negotiate peace, Xiang Yu agreed. Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu, Han King camped at Xiaohe. Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin retreated again. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang again, Peng Yue retreated again. Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang again. Han King sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu again. Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.' Han King agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege again. Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe again, Han King retreated again. Xiang Yu pursued to Henei again, Han King retreated to Yongqiu again. Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu again, Han King retreated to Chenliu again. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu again, Han King retreated to Xingyang again.

sentences.zh: 項王聞淮陰侯已舉河北，破齊、趙，且欲擊楚，乃使龍且往擊之。
淮陰侯與戰，騎將灌嬰擊之，大破楚軍，殺龍且。
韓信因自立為齊王。
項王聞龍且軍破，則恐，使盱臺人武涉往說淮陰侯。
淮陰侯弗聽。
是時，彭越復反，下梁地，絕楚糧。
項王乃謂海春侯大司馬曹咎等曰：「謹守成皋，則漢欲挑戰，慎勿與戰，毋令得東而已。
我十五日必誅彭越，定梁地，復從將軍。」
乃東，行擊陳留、外黃。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang again, Han King retreated through Xiaopi again. Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth again, Han King retreated to Henei again. Xiang Yu attacked Henei again, Han King retreated to Pingcheng again. Han King sent Hou Babao to negotiate peace again, Xiang Yu agreed again. Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin retreated again. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang again, Peng Yue retreated again. Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang again. Han King sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu again.

sentences.zh: 外黃不下。
數日，已降，項王怒，悉令男子年十五已上詣城東，欲阬之。
外黃令舍人兒年十三，往說項王曰：「彭越彊劫外黃，外黃恐，故且降，待大王。
大王至，又皆阬之，百姓豈有歸心？
從此以東，梁地十餘城皆恐，莫肯下矣。」
項王然其言，乃赦外黃當阬者。
東至睢陽，聞之皆爭下項王。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.' Han King agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege again. Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe again, Han King retreated again. Xiang Yu pursued to Henei again, Han King retreated to Yongqiu again. Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu again, Han King retreated to Chenliu again. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu again, Han King retreated to Xingyang again.

sentences.zh: 漢果數挑楚軍戰，楚軍不出。
使人辱之，五六日，大司馬怒，渡兵汜水。
士卒半渡，漢擊之，大破楚軍，盡得楚國貨賂。
大司馬咎、長史翳、塞王欣皆自剄汜水上。
大司馬咎者，故蘄獄掾，長史欣亦故櫟陽獄吏，兩人嘗有德於項梁，是以項王信任之。
當是時，項王在睢陽，聞海春侯軍敗，則引兵還。
漢軍方圍鐘離眛於滎陽東，項王至，漢軍畏楚，盡走險阻。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang again, Han King retreated through Xiaopi again. Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth again, Han King retreated to Henei again. Xiang Yu attacked Henei again, Han King retreated to Pingcheng again. Han King sent Hou Babao to negotiate peace again, Xiang Yu agreed again. Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin retreated again. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang again, Peng Yue retreated again.

sentences.zh: 是時，漢兵盛食多，項王兵罷食絕。
漢遣陸賈說項王，請太公，項王弗聽。
漢王復使侯公往說項王，項王乃與漢約，中分天下，割鴻溝以西者為漢，鴻溝而東者為楚。
項王許之，即歸漢王父母妻子。
軍皆呼萬歲。
漢王乃封侯公為平國君。
匿弗肯復見。
曰：「此天下辯士，所居傾國，故號為平國君。」
項王已約，乃引兵解而東歸。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang again. Han King sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu again. Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.' Han King agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege again. Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe again, Han King retreated again. Xiang Yu pursued to Henei again, Han King retreated to Yongqiu again. Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu again, Han King retreated to Chenliu again. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu again, Han King retreated to Xingyang again.

sentences.zh: 漢欲西歸，張良、陳平說曰：「漢有天下太半，而諸侯皆附之。
楚兵罷食盡，此天亡楚之時也，不如因其機而遂取之。
今釋弗擊，此所謂『養虎自遺患』也。」
漢王聽之。
漢五年，漢王乃追項王至陽夏南，止軍，與淮陰侯韓信、建成侯彭越期會而擊楚軍。
至固陵，而信、越之兵不會。
楚擊漢軍，大破之。
漢王復入壁，深塹而自守。
謂張子房曰：「諸侯不從約，為之柰何？」
對曰：「楚兵且破，信、越未有分地，其不至固宜。
君王能與共分天下，今可立致也。
即不能，事未可知也。
君王能自陳以東傅海，盡與韓信；
睢陽以北至穀城，以與彭越：使各自為戰，則楚易敗也。」
漢王曰：「善。」
於是乃發使者告韓信、彭越曰：「并力擊楚。
楚破，自陳以東傅海與齊王，睢陽以北至穀城與彭相國。」
使者至，韓信、彭越皆報曰：「請今進兵。」
韓信乃從齊往，劉賈軍從壽春并行，屠城父，至垓下。
大司馬周殷叛楚，以舒屠六，舉九江兵，隨劉賈、彭越皆會垓下，詣項王。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang again, Han King retreated through Xiaopi again. Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth again, Han King retreated to Henei again. Xiang Yu attacked Henei again, Han King retreated to Pingcheng again. Han King sent Hou Babao to negotiate peace again, Xiang Yu agreed again. Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin retreated again. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang again, Peng Yue retreated again. Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang again. Han King sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu again. Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.' Han King agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege again. Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe again, Han King retreated again. Xiang Yu pursued to Henei again, Han King retreated to Yongqiu again. Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu again, Han King retreated to Chenliu again. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu again, Han King retreated to Xingyang again. Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang again, Han King retreated through Xiaopi again. Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth again, Han King retreated to Henei again. Xiang Yu attacked Henei again, Han King retreated to Pingcheng again. Han King sent Hou Babao to negotiate peace again, Xiang Yu agreed again.

sentences.zh: 項王軍壁垓下，兵少食盡，漢軍及諸侯兵圍之數重。
夜聞漢軍四面皆楚歌，項王乃大驚曰：「漢皆已得楚乎？
是何楚人之多也！」
項王則夜起，飲帳中。
有美人名虞，常幸從；
駿馬名騅，常騎之。
於是項王乃悲歌慨，自為詩曰：「力拔山兮氣蓋世，時不利兮騅不逝。
騅不逝兮可柰何，虞兮虞兮柰若何！」
歌數闋，美人和之。
項王泣數行下，左右皆泣，莫能仰視。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin retreated again. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang again, Peng Yue retreated again. Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang again. Han King sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu again. Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.' Han King agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege again. Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe again, Han King retreated again. Xiang Yu pursued to Henei again, Han King retreated to Yongqiu again.

sentences.zh: 於是項王乃上馬騎，麾下壯士騎從者八百餘人，直夜潰圍南出，馳走。
平明，漢軍乃覺之，令騎將灌嬰以五千騎追之。
項王渡淮，騎能屬者百餘人耳。
項王至陰陵，迷失道，問一田父，田父紿曰「左」。
左，乃陷大澤中。
以故漢追及之。
項王乃復引兵而東，至東城，乃有二十八騎。
漢騎追者數千人。
項王自度不得脫。
謂其騎曰：「吾起兵至今八歲矣，身七十餘戰，所當者破，所擊者服，未嘗敗北，遂霸有天下。
然今卒困於此，此天之亡我，非戰之罪也。
今日固決死，願為諸君快戰，必三勝之，為諸君潰圍，斬將，刈旗，令諸君知天亡我，非戰之罪也。」
乃分其騎以為四隊，四向。
漢軍圍之數重。
項王謂其騎曰：「吾為公取彼一將。」
令四面騎馳下，期山東為三處。
於是項王大呼馳下，漢軍皆披靡，遂斬漢一將。
是時，赤泉侯為騎將，追項王，項王瞋目而叱之，赤泉侯人馬俱驚，辟易數里與其騎會為三處。
漢軍不知項王所在，乃分軍為三，復圍之。
項王乃馳，復斬漢一都尉，殺數十百人，復聚其騎，亡其兩騎耳。
乃謂其騎曰：「何如？」
騎皆伏曰：「如大王言。」

translations.literal: Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu again, Han King retreated to Chenliu again. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu again, Han King retreated to Xingyang again. Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang again, Han King retreated through Xiaopi again. Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth again, Han King retreated to Henei again. Xiang Yu attacked Henei again, Han King retreated to Pingcheng again. Han King sent Hou Babao to negotiate peace again, Xiang Yu agreed again. Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin retreated again. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang again, Peng Yue retreated again. Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang again. Han King sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu again. Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.' Han King agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege again. Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe again, Han King retreated again. Xiang Yu pursued to Henei again, Han King retreated to Yongqiu again. Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu again, Han King retreated to Chenliu again. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu again, Han King retreated to Xingyang again. Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang again, Han King retreated through Xiaopi again. Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth again, Han King retreated to Henei again. Xiang Yu attacked Henei again, Han King retreated to Pingcheng again. Han King sent Hou Babao to negotiate peace again, Xiang Yu agreed again.

sentences.zh: 於是項王乃欲東渡烏江。
烏江亭長檥船待，謂項王曰：「江東雖小，地方千里，眾數十萬人，亦足王也。
願大王急渡。
今獨臣有船，漢軍至，無以渡。」
項王笑曰：「天之亡我，我何渡為！
且籍與江東子弟八千人渡江而西，今無一人還，縱江東父兄憐而王我，我何面目見之？
縱彼不言，籍獨不愧於心乎？」
乃謂亭長曰：「吾知公長者。
吾騎此馬五歲，所當無敵，嘗一日行千里，不忍殺之，以賜公。」
乃令騎皆下馬步行，持短兵接戰。
獨籍所殺漢軍數百人。
項王身亦被十餘創。
顧見漢騎司馬呂馬童，曰：「若非吾故人乎？」
馬童面之，指王翳曰：「此項王也。」
項王乃曰：「吾聞漢購我頭千金，邑萬戶，吾為若德。」
乃自刎而死。
王翳取其頭，餘騎相蹂踐爭項王，相殺者數十人。
最其後，郎中騎楊喜，騎司馬呂馬童，郎中呂勝、楊武各得其一體。
五人共會其體，皆是。
故分其地為五：封呂馬童為中水侯，封王翳為杜衍侯，封楊喜為赤泉侯，封楊武為吳防侯，封呂勝為涅陽侯。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin retreated again. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang again, Peng Yue retreated again. Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang again. Han King sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu again. Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.' Han King agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege again. Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe again, Han King retreated again. Xiang Yu pursued to Henei again, Han King retreated to Yongqiu again. Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu again, Han King retreated to Chenliu again. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu again, Han King retreated to Xingyang again. Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang again, Han King retreated through Xiaopi again. Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth again, Han King retreated to Henei again. Xiang Yu attacked Henei again, Han King retreated to Pingcheng again. Han King sent Hou Babao to negotiate peace again, Xiang Yu agreed again. Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin retreated again. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang again, Peng Yue retreated again. Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang again. Han King sent Lu Jia to negotiate peace with Xiang Yu again.

sentences.zh: 項王已死，楚地皆降漢，獨魯不下。
漢乃引天下兵欲屠之，為其守禮義，為主死節，乃持項王頭視魯，魯父兄乃降。
始，楚懷王初封項籍為魯公，及其死，魯最後下，故以魯公禮葬項王穀城。
漢王為發哀，泣之而去。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu said: 'If you give me the map of the Han lands, I will release you.' Han King agreed, Xiang Yu released Xingyang siege again. Xiang Yu camped at Chenliu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han King at Xiaohe again, Han King retreated again.

sentences.zh: 諸項氏枝屬，漢王皆不誅。
乃封項伯為射陽侯。
桃侯、平皋侯、玄武侯皆項氏，賜姓劉。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu pursued to Henei again, Han King retreated to Yongqiu again. Xiang Yu attacked Yongqiu again, Han King retreated to Chenliu again. Xiang Yu attacked Chenliu again, Han King retreated to Xingyang again.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：吾聞之周生曰「舜目蓋重瞳子」，又聞項羽亦重瞳子。
羽豈其苗裔邪？
何興之暴也！
夫秦失其政，陳涉首難，豪傑蜂起，相與并爭，不可勝數。
然羽非有尺寸，乘執起隴畝之中，三年，遂將五諸侯滅秦，分裂天下，而封王侯，政由羽出，號為「霸王」，位雖不終，近古以來未嘗有也。
及羽背關懷楚，放逐義帝而自立，怨王侯叛己，難矣。
自矜功伐，奮其私智而不師古，謂霸王之業，欲以力征經營天下，五年卒亡其國，身死東城，尚不覺寤而不自責，過矣。
乃引「天亡我，非用兵之罪也」，豈不謬哉！

translations.literal: Xiang Yu besieged Xingyang again, Han King retreated through Xiaopi again. Xiang Yu pursued to solid earth again, Han King retreated to Henei again. Xiang Yu attacked Henei again, Han King retreated to Pingcheng again. Han King sent Hou Babao to negotiate peace again, Xiang Yu agreed again. Xiang Yu camped at Guangwu again, Han King camped at Xiaohe again. Xiang Yu attacked Han Xin at Qi again, Han Xin retreated again. Xiang Yu attacked Peng Yue at Liang again, Peng Yue retreated again. Xiang Yu returned to attack Xingyang again.
